nodes.bodyText: We haven't been prefixing classes with Ground since the package name sufficiently disambiguates. Could we use CameraPosition instead?

Sure. There's already a CameraPosition class in com.google.android.gms.maps.model so I added the Ground prefix to our class to avoid having to qualify usage of both classes in GoogleMapsMapAdapter, however, it's only one line so actually CameraPosition makes much more sense.
Strike "viewport", since it implies the bounds are returned; better just "camera position".
Thanks. Btw did you know that you can insert a suggestion like this using the +/- symbol above?
